We were fucking meant to be, and your the only one in my book...so why dont you call me anymore? Do you just want to go and throw a good thing away? I'm tired of trying to reach you only to wind up at a dead end. If you havent already moved on, then please put some effort into trying to hang out with me. You're breaking my heart....
It's a pretty sad feeling when you realize that you have absolutely no life whatsoever, and nor will you ever have a life...

Since you won't talk to me online, and you won't answer my phone calls, the only thing i can do is talk to you here. What have you been doing? How come you won't talk to me? Are you seeing anybody else? Maybe if we actually talked we could figure out whats on each others minds. I keep trying to get a hold of you but you keep ignoring me. It doesn't make sense to just throw away a relationship that we've had for a year and a half. I just wanted you to know that I think about you a lot, and I miss you. It hurts to know that you don't care about me...

hangin with my boo.
we are having a ball.
woot woot.

<3

I started off the day today by going up to Macomb and buying my books for next semester. It's funny because all my books this semester are tiny, compared to the huge ass ones I had last semester. Today was a pretty good day for hangin out with the GF. She came over and we watched Forrest Gump, which I must say is a kick ass movie. We chilled for a while and Steph took some cute pictures of us together. Then later we went and seen White Noise. White Noise isnt as kick ass as Forrest Gump, but it's a pretty good movie. I really don't have much goin on these days, except for school is starting back up next week. I'm glad for that, because I'll actually have something to do instead of sitting on my ass all day.

Been a while since I updated this bitch aye? Well yeah there aint much goin on with me lately. I dont have a job but Im going back to school in about three weeks so its all good I guess. I quit work so that I could focus solely on school and all that good stuff. I also want to get A+ certified by the winter semester but how many times have I said that Im going to do that. Too many to count. Anyways tomorrow Im driving up to Caseville to see Steph and then Im gonna spend a week with my mom and dad up north. It should be really fun cuz were gonna have jet skis and I guess our boat is fixed too...so that rocks. Right now I cant wait to go up there cuz Im super bored just sittin here on my ass. Seems like this whole summer I havent done anything besides sit. Oh well...im a lazy person by nature. Well I aint got much more to say so peace out bitches...
I feel like Im on a different planet here, and everything is unraveling...

Hmmm so i guess today is the 10th anniversary of Kurt Cobains death. They really found him on April 8th but he killed himself on the 5th. Anyways theyre playing a bunch of Nirvana songs on the radio and thats pretty sweet cuz Im rockin out. Later..

As all of you may know, saturday night was the Trapt, Smile Empty Soul, and Strata concert. Stephanie, Stacie and me all went to Harpos to see this rock extravaganza. It was a pretty good time but I liked the last concert a lot better, maybe its just because I like the State Theatre a lot better or something. For one there was absolutely nowhere to fucking park and that was a colossal bitch to deal with. Then when we got inside there wasnt as much room as there is in the State Theatre. To top it all off Finger 11 was not even there and I wanted to see them soo bad cuz I've liked them for a few years now. DONT GET ME WRONG THOUGH IT WAS STILL REALLY FUN!!! Here are some pics from the concert...
me with stacies sweet new hat
this guy had a sweet mohawk
rockin out on stage
yepppppppp
some shit goin on right there
those lights look sweet in the background!

Anyways at the concert I really didnt like Strata that much, but I really did like Smile Empty Soul. They did Bottom of A Bottle and I was rockin out with my cock out. That was my favorite part of the night, not to mention the singer from SES drinkin a beer in between singing! Trapt came on and the first song they played was Still Frame and that was pretty cool, but the singer was really weird. He was walkin around on stage like he was all holier than thou and shit. After the concert we went to National and got some food cuz I was super hungry. I was about to kill that bitch if she didnt bring me my food faster!! Today was a famizzle gathering at my grandmas house and it was fun. Steph came with me and we ate some food and hung out with relatives. This is my cousin Nick and hes a super pimp..
Thats about it excpet for one more thing...

I LOVE YOU STEPHANIE MARIE BOWDEN!!!!

Today I spent most of the day with Stephanie and it was just a grand ole time!!! I guess from now on when we chill in the living room we need a "chaperone" cuz we are just out of control...silly children. I went to work and that was not bad at all. We got a new girl and she was really scared and nervous; I felt really bad for her but I was kinda busy so I really couldnt make her feel welcome. Oh well everyone there is rude so she needs to get used to that. Well well well my stomach is feeling better so what you all think about that?! Concert is in three days so Im getting really excited! Im out, love ya steph..

If there was ever a waste of a day, today would be that day...it was just super fucking stupid. Went to school and actually learned some things in class, but thats where it went downhill. Stephanie was sick and I did not get to see her AT ALL and that really burns me up. I just really want to see her. I went to the Verizon Store to get my antenna fixed and they charged me $10 for it...WTF they never charged me before! After that I went to some business seminar that I thought was gonna be worth my time but it was just a big money pyramid scam, and they wanted $235 up front. Fuck that. Mind you all this is going on while I have a stomach ache cuz I am not eating anything. I don't eat cuz I dont feel hungry and later on I get these pains in my stomach and its just not pleasant. I have nothing more to say...au revoir

I woke up this morning and it felt like someone had been sitting on my stomach all nite...it hurt like a bitch! I got over that for a while and went to pick up my girl from school. I was thinking that we had a early release instead of a half day, and I was gonna feel really dumb for comin up there an hour early. Then we chilled at my house all day and we fell asleep on my luxury bed! That thing is such a piece of shit i swear! I didnt wanna leave her but I had to so that I could go to work. Work was pretty boring so I left an hour earlier than what i was supposed to. Steph wrote i love you on my keyboard so everyone has to call it the sex keyboard now. Check it out:
I cant wait for the Trapt concert next Saturday...its gonna be awesome. I wanna go see A Perfect Circle and Default but I doubt I will have enough money for those shows.

Isnt it weird how something can happen, and at the time you dont think much about it, but later on it kills you? I really do hate that shit. Anyways...I've been updating a lot lately and I guess thats pretty cool. My mom bought me a bag of Jolly Rancher suckers and I been eatin them one after another. In other news, tomorrow I am bringing in my camera for the Fitz Hotties communnity...that should be some funny shit there buddy. Tomorrow it is supposed to snow what the fuck is up with that...two to three inches. I wanted to wash my car tomorrow but i guess I cant now. Tomorrow I think Ill just do my taxes or something since I havent even done them yet and theyre due pretty soon. Or maybe Ill just study for my Macomb Class I dunno yet. Im gonna try to wake up early and do some stuff tomorrow morning but that never happens cuz Im lazy...

I kinda felt bad for him but he was fat so I'm sure he has no regrets! I shall be going so see ya...

May I just say that this week rocked. Everyone else was on break but I still had school and work so it wasnt much of a break for me huh? Best part of my week was seein Steph like every day and doin a bunch of fun stuff. Then I got my engine in the mail for my truck so thats pretty sweet too! Justin and I have been talkin too so things are going great right now. Lately I've been excited about 50 million things...like I think I want to open up a hobby shop and just work with a bunch of my friends. Im also excited cuz Im savin up and maybe in a year or two Ill have my own place to crash. That would be sweet cuz my parents dont appreciate me comin home at 3 in the mornin lol. I already know what kind of dog Im gonna get and where Im gonna buy my groceries from and eveything! As for school it's actually going alright this semester. Im learning some useful stuff and sometimes I actually look forward to going. I think I might take some entrepuneur and marketing classes cuz that would help when I go to open my shop. I'm looking forward to this summer too because Im gonna be going on sooo many neat trips and Ill be all over the place. Last nite was the concert and it was really freakin sweet. Stephanie and me went to see MXPX, Sugarcult, Motion City Soundtrack and Simple Plan. We started off by cutting in front of every single person that was in line and no one bitched, how cool is that? After a while we got too cold so we gave up our spot in line and went to Hockeytown and I ate these nasty ass chicken pitas that made my breath smell like a sewer. We hung out at Hockeytown for a while and we played this hockey game thing which was totally awesome. When it was time to leave we left and stood outside in this huge ass line which wrapped around like four blocks. Out of nowhere this dude just started walkin down the street in a muscle shirt and I was like "wow that guy is a bad ass". After that a limo drove by with a bunch of hookers in it and I told them to fuck off or something like that. We got inside and some dumb black dude tried to take my camera from me cuz your not supposed to have them in there. I was like yeah whatever give it back to me and he did. I'm gettin kinda tired of typin all these details but when we finally got inside the bands were really good and it was neat to be like right in front of them on the main floor. After the concert I turned on this one road and I looked, and I was like man look at that jack ass goin the wrong way. All of a sudden the car turned on its flashers and a cop came over the loud speaker and was like "turn your piece of shit around and go the other way dumb fuck!!" I felt so embarassed but I couldnt help but laugh cuz who just does that. I bet Steph didnt think she would have a good time with me but guess what we had a great time so Im really stoked about that.
